price: Kuma kan waɗanda suka tũba (Yãhũdu) Mun haramta abin da Muka bãyar da lãbari a gare ka daga gabãni,* kuma ba Mu zãlunce su ba, amma sun kasance kansu suke zãlunta.
arabic: وَعَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُواْ حَرَّمۡنَا مَا قَصَصۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ
footnotes: * Gabãnin wancan sũra, kamar a cikin sũratul An'ãm ãyã ta l46. Sabõda haka bã a biyar da Yahũdu a wajen haramcin abin da Allah Ya haramta musu, su kaɗai sabõda zãluncinsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waʿalā alladhīna hādū ḥarramnā mā qaṣaṣnā ʿalayka min qablu wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūna
